rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative adjective directly modifying a risk-adjective.
The segment uses neutral language without high-potency verbs or potent metaphors.
This segment reports on financial or trade metrics ('exports dropped by $1.1 billion, or 26%') which are treated as factual reporting and are neutral under Q3 rules.
The segment does not contain a loaded rhetorical question.
This segment provides historical information, lacking explicit calming cues.
No minimiser or scale contrast found.
